mapper.select: select cl.id, cl.gmt_create as gmtCreate, c.id as courseId, c.title, c.cover, CONVERT(c.price, DECIMAL(8,2)) AS price, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, t.name as teacherName from edu_course_collect cl left join edu_course c on c.id = cl.course_id left join edu_teacher t on t.id = c.teacher_id where member_id = #{memberId} order by cl.gmt_create desc
